descriptions.8ball: The Magic 8 Ball that will answer all your questions
descriptions.feedback: Gives you instructions on how to give feedback towards the bot
descriptions.help: Shows you all available commands and general info about the bot
descriptions.hypixelstats: Shows you basic Hypixel stats for the provided user
descriptions.hypixelunverify: Unlinks your Discord account from your Hypixel player
descriptions.hypixelverify: Links your Discord account with your Hypixel player
descriptions.language: Changes your language, shows your current one or a list of available languages
descriptions.languagestats: Shows you the progress of a language on the all projects we currently support
descriptions.mention: Mentions a language role with a message
descriptions.minecraft: Looks up a specific Minecraft player's name history or skin
descriptions.prefix: Lets you pick an appropriate prefix for your language(s)
descriptions.profile: Gives you the link to your Crowdin profile if it's stored on our database.
descriptions.projects: Gives you links and information about all the translation projects we support on the server
descriptions.quote: Shows a funny/weird/wise quote from the server
descriptions.rank: Gives you the current XP for yourself or any given user
descriptions.tag: Sends a preset message, allowing you to notify a specific member when sending it
descriptions.translate: Gives you useful information on how to translate the bot
descriptions.verify: Verifies and gives you your corresponding roles
descriptions.poll: Создаёт или управляет опросами на сервере. Доступно для корректоров Hypixel и выше

question.name: вопрос
question.description: The question to ask the bot

me.name: я
me.description: Whether to start at the page you appear in. Has priority over the "page" argument

user.name: пользователь
user.description: The user to find the profile for. Admin only

profile.name: профиль
profile.description: The new profile to set for the user. Admin only

user.name: пользователь
user.description: The user to get the rank for

tag.name: тег
tag.description: The tag you want to see

choices.proofreader: Как получить корректора в проекте Hypixel

target.name: цель
target.description: The user to mention with this tag

command.name: команда
command.description: The command to get information for

username.name: имяпользователя
username.description: The IGN of the user to get statistics for. Can also be a UUID

user.name: пользователь
user.description: The server member to get statistics for. Only works if the user has verified themselves

user.name: пользователь
user.description: The user to unverify. Admin only

username.name: имяпользователя
username.description: Your Hypixel IGN. Must have your Discord linked in-game

user.name: пользователь
user.description: The user to verify. Admin only

set.name: установить
set.description: Sets your language to a new one. Leave empty to see your current language

language.name: язык
language.description: The new language you want to set

list.name: список
list.description: Gives you a list of all the available languages

stats.name: статистика
stats.description: Gives you usage statistics for a given language. Admin only

language.name: язык
language.description: The language to get usage statistics for

language.name: язык
language.description: The language to get progress statistics for. Required if your language is set to English

message.name: сообщение
message.description: The message to send with the mention

history.name: история
history.description: Shows a user's name history. You must provide at least 1 parameter if your MC account is not linked

username.name: имяпользователя
username.description: The IGN/UUID of the user to get name history for. Defaults to your user if your account is linked

user.name: пользователь
user.description: The server member to get name history for. Only works if the user has verified themselves

skin.name: скин
skin.description: Shows a user's skin. You must provide at least 1 parameter if your MC account is not linked

username.name: имяпользователя
username.description: The IGN/UUID of the user to get skin for. Defaults to your user if your account is linked

user.name: пользователь
user.description: The server member to get skin for. Only works if the user has verified themselves

flags.name: флаги
flags.description: The flags to be applied to your prefix, separated with spaces

index.name: индекс
index.description: The index of the quote you want to see

add.name: добавить
add.description: Add a new quote. Staff only

quote.name: цитата
quote.description: The quote you want to add

url.name: ссылка
url.description: The URL of the message this quote came from. If the message has an image it will be included as well

image.name: изображение
image.description: The URL of the image to be included with this quote. Has priority over URL's image if provided

index.name: индекс
index.description: The index of the quote to edit

index.name: индекс
index.description: The index of the quote to delete

link.name: ссылка
link.description: Link a quote to a message. Staff only

index.name: индекс
index.description: The index of the quote to link

url.name: ссылка
url.description: The URL of the message to link this quote to

image.name: изображение
image.description: Whether or not to attach this message's image to the quote

url.name: ссылка
url.description: The URL to your Crowdin profile. Must have your Discord tag in your "About me" section

user.name: пользователь
user.description: The user to manually verify. Admin only

start.name: начать
start.description: Starts a poll in the current channel

option1.name: 1_опция
option1.description: The first option in the poll

option2.name: 2_опция
option2.description: The second option in the poll

time.name: время
time.description: How long before this poll is automatically closed and results are published (in hours)

option3.name: 3_опция
option3.description: The third option in the poll

option4.name: 4_опция
option4.description: The fourth option in the poll

option5.name: 5_опция
option5.description: The fifth option in the poll

option6.name: 6_опция
option6.description: The sixth option in the poll

option7.name: 7_опция
option7.description: The seventh option in the poll

option8.name: 8_опция
option8.description: The eighth option in the poll

end.name: завершить
end.description: End a poll given its message ID

message_id.name: id_сообщения
message_id.description: The ID of the message containing the poll

channel.name: channel
channel.description: The channel the poll was posted in, if not the current one

show.name: посмотреть
show.description: Shows the current results of a poll without ending it. Only available to the creator of the poll

message_id.name: id_сообщения
message_id.description: The ID of the message containing the poll

channel.name: channel
channel.description: The channel the poll was posted in, if not the current one
